I wonder if become.com will ever release any of the source code 
publicly?  I doubt it since that would be helping their competitors.

You'd think they'd at least mention the existence of Heritrix in the 
article.  ;)

Frank


Eric wrote:
> Just wanted to point everyone to this article about become.com's
> crawler they implemented in Java.  Perhaps some interesting
> comparisons between heritrix' and theirs' architectures:
> 
> http://java.sun.com/developer/technicalArticles/WebServices/become/
